user_instruction: 'Send Ethan the details for the book cover design (ethan.designs@freelancegfx.com). You can check out my Notion for information.'

          "text": "Book Cover Design Brief - Whispers of the Past"
        },
        {
          "id": "1f60dc8f-a0db-8174-b57d-e16d6f1d7cd7",
          "type": "paragraph",
          "created_time": "2025-05-17T06:10:00.000Z",
          "last_edited_time": "2025-05-17T06:10:00.000Z",
          "has_children": false,
          "text": "The book cover for 'Whispers of the Past' should evoke a sense of mystery and nostalgia. The main elements to include are an old, ornate key and a faded letter.       "id": "1f60dc8f-a0db-81ec-83b0-d9cc4655d123",

          "last_edited_time": "2025-05-17T06:10:00.000Z",
          "has_children": false,
          "text": "While the plot of 'Whispers of the Past' is somewhat clichéd with predictable twists, and the characters lack depth, the setting descriptions are vivid and could be visually compelling for the cover design."

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["ethan.designs@freelancegfx.com"],"subject":"Book Cover Design Brief – “Whispers of the Past”","body":"Hi Ethan,

I’m excited to move forward with the cover for my upcoming novel, “Whispers of the Past.” Here’s the core brief:

• Mood: A blend of mystery and nostalgia.
• Key Visual Elements: An old, ornate key paired with a faded letter.
• Colour Palette: Muted, earthy tones (think weather-worn browns, soft olive greens, and hints of antique gold).

The design should feel timeless and slightly haunting—enough to intrigue readers while still conveying warmth and memory.

I’ll send the full synopsis and author bio in a separate message for added context. Let me know if you need anything else or if we should hop on a quick call to discuss.

Thanks so much, and I’m looking forward to your creative ideas!

Best,
[Your Name]"}
